result.reason: Startup reconnect currently only reopens persisted tree nodes (`PleaseConnect`) and ignores Quick Connect sessions, so adding lightweight Quick Connect session persistence will make the option behave as users expect.
result.approach: Persist minimal metadata for active Quick Connect sessions on exit and replay them during startup reconnect, plus tests for mixed saved and quick-connect sessions.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Startup reconnect currently only reopens persisted tree nodes (`PleaseConnect`) and ignores Quick Connect sessions, so adding lightweight Quick Connect session persistence will make the option behave as users expect.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Tree/PreviousSessionOpener.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/QuickConnectToolStrip.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionsService.cs","mRemoteNGTests/Tree/PreviousSessionOpenerTests.cs"],"approach":"Persist minimal metadata for active Quick Connect sessions on exit and replay them during startup reconnect, plus tests for mixed saved and quick-connect sessions."}
